name: To validate the forgot password functionality with valid and invalid credentials.

testSteps.description: 1: To validate the forgot password functionality with valid and invalid credentials. ({Emails=test@gmail.com})

children.description: Given To open the Afrexim application
When To click the Apply for facility option
Click applyfacility
And Click the Forgot Password link
Click the forgot password link
And Validate the Reset Password pop-up page
Validate the reset password popup page
And Enter valid and invalid email credentials "test@gmail.com"
Enter valid and invalid email credentials: test@gmail.com
And Click Submit button for reset page
Click submit button for reset page
Then Validate positive and negative status message using respective credentials
Validate positive and negative status message

exception.message: Expected enabled element was not enabled
